titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit nonparty multicandidate political committee contributions in elections for Federal office.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

bill.summary: 01/21/1997--Introduced. Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit nonparty multicandidate political committee contributions in elections for Federal office.
